backend/main.mo: Defines core types and logic for products, carts, wishlists, lookbook images, site content, and authorization, integrating blob storage and access control for the backend canister.
backend/migration.mo: Provides a migration function that updates admin email and password fields in the actor state.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing removal of token-based admin bootstrap UI, listing affected files, components, and test references.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of key frontend files covering routing, hooks, UI components, pages, styling, and admin layout behavior.
frontend/.env.example: Example environment file defining WhatsApp checkout target number and placeholders for additional variables.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base file defining global OKLCH color variables, dark mode tokens, and shared component styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entrypoint mounting the React app and loading the main TypeScript bundle.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React router-like component handling URL parsing, page navigation, and state for catalog filters and product selection.
frontend/src/components/admin/HomepageBa: Admin UI for creating, editing, and deleting homepage banners with image upload, text fields, and destination settings.
frontend/src/components/AdminLayout.tsx: Admin layout component handling Internet Identity check, email/password admin login, navigation, and restricted-access UI rendering.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders the site footer with brand info, navigation links, customer service links, and social icons, using onNavigate for routing. Includes dynamic year, logo, and structured link sections.
frontend/src/components/GuestMergePrompt: A modal prompting users to merge guest cart or wishlist items into their account, with configurable type and item count. Provides confirm and skip actions.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Renders the main site header with navigation, search, mobile menu, auth handling, theme toggle, and cart/wishlist counts. Integrates user identity hooks and dynamic navigation behavior.
frontend/src/components/home/HomepageBan: Displays rotating homepage banners with text, navigation buttons, and click handling based on banner destination.
frontend/src/components/home/HomepageSec: Renders homepage content sections with optional titles, images, text, and a link to the About page.
frontend/src/components/MediaSlotUploade: Allows uploading, previewing, replacing, and removing an image using ExternalBlob with progress tracking. Provides validation and status feedback via toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/ProductCard.tsx: Displays an interactive product card with hover image swap, add-to-cart, wishlist, and quick view actions. Handles guest vs authenticated behavior and navigates to the product page.
frontend/src/components/RichTextEditor.t: A simple rich text editor using contentEditable with toolbar controls for formatting and links. Syncs HTML content through onChange and supports placeholders and focus styling.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useGuestCart.ts: Manages a guest user's shopping cart stored in local storage with add, remove, and clear functions.
frontend/src/hooks/useGuestWishlist.ts: Handles guest wishlist persistence with add, remove, and clear operations using local storage.
frontend/src/hooks/useHomepageBanners.ts: React Query hooks for fetching and mutating homepage banners through the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context with login, logout, stored identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for products, cart, wishlist, lookbook, and admin product actions using an actor backend.
frontend/src/hooks/useSiteContent.ts: Fetches and updates site content including publishing and dark mode toggling with React Query.
frontend/src/hooks/useThemeMode.ts: Manages theme mode with localStorage override and applies dark/light classes based on site content.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light/dark theme variables, gold utilities, and base styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with Internet Identity and React Query providers.
frontend/src/pages/About.tsx: Renders the About page with mission, values, and images for the brand.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminCategories: Provides an admin view for browsing, searching, and sorting product categories derived from products. Displays category statistics and supports sorting by name or product count.
Admin dashboard summarizing product, lookbook, category, and inventory stats with quick navigation. Loads product and lookbook data and computes derived stats.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminLookbook.t: Admin interface for managing lookbook images with search, sort, add, and edit functionality. Supports image uploads, tagging products, and editing metadata.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminProducts.t: Admin UI for listing, filtering, sorting, creating, editing, and deleting products with image upload support.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminSessions.t: Admin page showing informational cards and placeholders for user session and cart analytics.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminSiteSettin: Admin interface for editing hero text, contact details, banners, and theme settings with draft and publish support.
frontend/src/pages/Cart.tsx: Displays and manages the shopping cart using guest cart logic and product lookup.
frontend/src/pages/Checkout.tsx: Shows order summary for guest cart and initiates WhatsApp-based checkout.
frontend/src/pages/Contact.tsx: Renders a contact page with hero text, contact info cards using site content, and a styled contact form.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Displays homepage sections including hero banner, category cards, and featured/new products with navigation handlers.
frontend/src/pages/Lookbook.tsx: Shows a grid of lookbook images with product tags and an image detail dialog that links to related products.
frontend/src/pages/ProductCatalog.tsx: Implements a product catalog with filters, sorting, and responsive filter drawer, rendering filtered product cards.
frontend/src/pages/ProductDetail.tsx: Displays product images, details, size/color selectors, and actions for cart and wishlist with loading skeletons.
frontend/src/pages/Returns.tsx: Renders a returns and exchanges info page with policy details and guidance on returns, exchanges, and support. Uses cards and prose sections for structured instructions.
frontend/src/pages/Shipping.tsx: Displays shipping information including delivery times, packaging, processing, tracking, and policy details. Uses cards for key info and a prose section for the full policy.
frontend/src/pages/Wishlist.tsx: Shows wishlist items by combining wishlist IDs with product data, handling loading and empty states. Allows navigation to catalog or product pages.
frontend/src/utils/adminAuthError.ts: Parses backend auth errors into stable types for UI messaging, distinguishing invalid credentials from generic failures.
frontend/src/utils/bannerDestination.ts: Encodes, decodes, and handles navigation logic for banner destination metadata.
frontend/src/utils/bannerEncoding.ts: Utility to JSON-encode and decode banner text content with fallback handling.
frontend/src/utils/localCart.ts: Manages guest cart storage in localStorage with versioning and BigInt-safe serialization.
frontend/src/utils/localWishlist.ts: Handles guest wishlist persistence in localStorage with version checks.
frontend/src/utils/siteContentDefaults.t: Provides default site content values including hero text, contact info, and initial settings.
frontend/src/utils/storefrontNav.ts: Defines storefront navigation structure and category cards with associated catalog filters.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters (including hash routing) and persist them in sessionStorage, plus utilities to clear stored or hash parameters.
frontend/src/utils/whatsapp.ts: Builds a WhatsApp checkout URL by formatting cart item details into a message and normalizing the destination phone number.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, spacing, typography, container settings, animations, and theme extensions.
project_state.json: Describes current project issues and feature requests related to fixing admin email/password login and removing obsolete token-based bootstrap flows.
